name: Air Fryer Corn Nuts
author: Soup Loving Nicole
summary: Crunchy, salty, addictive corn nuts made easy and healthier thanks to the air fryer. This is my basic recipe, but feel free to add additional flavors such as Cajun seasoning, ranch powder, BBQ seasoning, chili powder, taco seasoning, etc.
ingredients: 14 ounces giant white corn (such as Goya®)
directions: Place corn in a large bowl, cover with water, and let sit 8 hours to overnight to re-hydrate
Drain corn and spread it in an even layer on a large baking sheet
Preheat air fryer to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Place corn in a large bowl
Place corn in batches in the basket of the air fryer in an even layer
Shake basket and cook another 10 minutes
Shake basket and cook 5 additional minutes and transfer to a paper towel-lined plate
Let corn nuts cool until crisp, about 20 minutes
